website_summaries.verdict: Based on the 10-Kirby wackiness from the “Kirby Mass Attack” game, this creatively designed toy set packed with pocket-sized Kirbys will be a hit with long-time fans.
pros: Includes 10 Kirby figurines and a Warp Star
Easy to stack the Kirbys into whatever shape you want
cons: It’s up to you to find the sturdiest Kirby stacking combinations

customer_reviews.title: Love these Kirby figures
customer_reviews.text: I bought these figures for my son's birthday cake. He loved them and the cake turned out really nice. He carries the figures around in his pocket. Now all his friends want a set of the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Great for stacking on cats!
customer_reviews.text: Kirby is quite possibly my favourite Nintendo character so I could not resist the cuteness of this! However actually stacking them and keeping them stacked is quite difficult as they only have a slight curved indentation on the bottom of each Kirby... I had thought there'd be some sort of magnet or interlock system. One bump to whatever surface you have them set on and they fall right over. Instead I focused my efforts on seeing how many I could stack on my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Halo Noir

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Cent!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of Kirby and enjoy displaying toys then you'll enjoy these. In terms of customizability, some of them can ride on each other and can stack (seen on pictures). Other than that it comes with the warp star, no set up required and are small enough that they can be p[lace almost anywhere on a flat surface. Would reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Learn many skills with this TOUGH, but Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super fun game that helps you learn how to relax and concentrate. The game is TOUGH and super adorable. We played for hours, both individually and with each other, which brought us many laughs and helped us learn team-building and communication skills. This game is great and would be an excellent addition for any psychiatrists office or any family's home looking for a unique game to play with the family on game night.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: I love these Kirbys so much!
customer_reviews.text: This little guys are so cute! Perfect for any Kirby fan, and just to make someone happy with 10 different little kirbys. They are a little difficult to stack up like the picture though. The shipping was fast and arrived safely. The package is really cute too, so I be keeping it around for a while :D
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe L.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to stack but still adorable
customer_reviews.text: They are difficult to stack because they’re round and there’s nothing to hold them together but can be done but they will fall semi easily. They are super cute so I still recommend them if you’re a big Kirby fan! It is annoying that you can’t see all of them in the cut out of the box though.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Kirby collectors!!
customer_reviews.text: These are soo cute. Good luck trying to stack these like shown in the picture. The box kind of shows you a few examples of which Kirby's to place by one another, but not combining them all into one tall stack. I still love them. They're each about the size of a cotton ball, all with different expressions. A few of them look similar, but have different facial expressions. The material these Kirby's are made of is good quality. You do see the line where they connected the molds, but only with close inspection. The star that comes with it is about 2 1/2" long. Maybe 3/4" thick. Overall, I was very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Fun Challenge
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. They are very hard to stack. Makes for a pretty fun game unless you have a cat anxiously waiting to knock them over. These sit on a shelf in my game room, so they stay stacked. Any little movement will knock them down though.
customer_reviews.author: BillButtLicker

customer_reviews.title: Something for every Kirby fan!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Sort of impossible to stack them up, but I did manage to get them to stack up like in the product photo! (After many tries, of course.) Now, it's pretty easy to stack 2 Kirbys on top of the Warp Star. Here's a photo of what they look like stacked up! (Apologies for the mess behind them.) Each Kirby is really cute and I love the little details in his face! Each one is great as a standalone display, and it's a lot of fun trying to get them to balance on top of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Jules K.

customer_reviews.title: I want to love these so much more than I do
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I want to love these so much more than I do, but they’re very difficult to keep stacked without the help of some adhesive or sticky tack. I wish they had magnets inside to keep them closer together. Thankfully, it’s Kirby, and Kirby is adorable, even when scattered about the desk.
customer_reviews.author: K-Robo

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband he loves it, and I'm glad I got it he doesn't use it or plays with it so that's ok he'll pick it up once in a while. The pieces are so cute and done very well the paint and the way they stack so cute I think I have more fun using it that my husband. Haha I secretly bought it for me. Now I just have to remind him to use it. This is one of the little things that I like to get its simple and fun.
customer_reviews.author: YUNA125

customer_reviews.title: These are ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! The box is lovely and in good conditions! The figures are very detailed and cute!! Would definitely recommend if you're a kirby fan or like cute things in general!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Wondeful!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these!! They are hard to keep track of since they are about an inch in each... but we do our best!! Love the different faces and poses!
customer_reviews.author: Josie S

customer_reviews.title: I love this Kirby set
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kirby set! I have these little guys sitting on my desk at work and nobody can seem to resist stacking them. After several tumbles, all the faces and fine details are still really good with no visible scuffs or anything. These guys are made out of some really durable material and feel like quality pieces. You can see seams on the characters, some more than others, but it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but kind of pricey. Worked well on my son’s cake, so it was worth it. As others have mentioned, they’re not magnetized for stacking. I wasn’t able to but I guess others were more skilled or took the time to try.
customer_reviews.author: extee

customer_reviews.title: It's like Kirby Jenga!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY MINI KIRBY SET! I actually assumed these guys were magnetic and was surprised when they showed up and they weren't. It's basically like a tiny game of Kirby Jenga. I actually like it a little better. It's like a little zen moment at work rearranging them. I've only managed to get 1 or 2 of the arrangements on the box. Some of them are actually pretty difficult as the kirby aren't perfectly balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Leia709

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what it appears. The little Kirby figurines do not stick together or snap together, they are just loose and it is a little frustrating trying to make the different poses as shown.
customer_reviews.author: DianeTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they appear
customer_reviews.text: These are very small, definitely don't recommend them for kids under 4, but I bought them for my godson's birthday and he absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: making them easily slip off of each other
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely some of the cutest things I've ever seen - but it's much more of a challenge than it looks in the pictures to actually stack them. All of the Kirbys are almost entirely smooth and round, making them easily slip off of each other. If you want a cute display item that is stacked like in the pictures, invest in some super glue. Otherwise, just know you are buying a rage-inducing, albeit adorable, stacking puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Most useless but best $30 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Kirby. Watched the TV show growing up, was my favorite character in every Super Smash Bros. game. Such a useless but amazing purchase. The figures are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sang Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love these little guys
customer_reviews.text: Love these little guys, cute packaging and the items themselves are great as well. Don't expect to be able to actually stack them though without some major balancing practice, they are still a fantastic item to buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Parker

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for Kirby collectors!!
customer_reviews.text: This gift is practically perfect in every way!! I already knew these figures don't stack as advertised (as the comments will tell you), so there wasn't much to be disappointed about here! :) The only thing that I will say is that the plastic mold line is pretty noticeable (you can see it in the pictures they show you above clearly), but thats just how it is with round characters like Kirby. For what it is, it's really good! The Kirbys are very tiny!! About the size of a large grape. But the face paint is great! Its fun to place them in a bunch of different places around my room :)
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Total hit from clueless aunt
customer_reviews.text: I have a total generation gap with my 14 year old nephew. I have no idea what he is talking about when it comes to gaming, pokemon, etc. I was a hero when this toy using some kinda game figure in its Japanese box was presented for his birthday. It felt much better than the gift cards I am usually reduced to.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Antoinette P. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: A hit at the office
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit at work. I leave them on my desk for people to try stacking them per the difficulty levels depicted in the box. It's been a good stress reliever for the office. Not to mention Kirby is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Arshes Nei

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: We’re super cute and came in a cute box my boyfriend loved them as a present
customer_reviews.author: Stripeyroo

customer_reviews.title: Cute! But..
customer_reviews.text: I received the package with all 10 Kirby's and the warp star, the only issues are the quality control, the faces of the Kirby's can be off centered or not colored in the eye lines correctly, and unfortunately my warps star's underside has a very noticeable scuff. Regardless of those problems, they don't ruin the figures, this makes for a cute gift for all Kirby fans!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: So adorable and fun to have a Kirby army!
customer_reviews.text: They're so cute and easy to stack uo! It's kinda difficult at first but once you get the hang of it, it's fun! Just have them on something sturdy bc if you even wobble a table they'll fall!
customer_reviews.author: Cwisx3

customer_reviews.title: too perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfection of any little Kirby toys there are. they add your office a very fun detail and its very useful when used to taking pictures with other Kirby toys. They are cute and just fun to look at.
customer_reviews.author: GTP

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift, they loved it! It's very cute and fun
customer_reviews.author: Elvin Natal

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to stack but I made it work. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rainie H.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in the product keeps them stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: So it's very cute. It looks just like the ad; however, they are just little figurines. When it said stackable it seemed like there would be some mechanisms like internal magnets or something that would allow them to stay together but that doesn't exist in the product so they constantly fall.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Suntheimer

customer_reviews.title: An awesome little set of Kirbys
customer_reviews.text: An awesome little set of Kirbys! But just so all potential buyers are aware, each Kirby is only about the size of a quarter, as I noticed they look bigger in the pictures. That being said, they are cute little figures and for the price they really can't be beat. Quality on them is good despite some small seams in the plastic. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boyfriend after he had my play my first Kirby game because why not. They are so cute and all came in amazing quality. Package was so nice he kept the box! They all settle on top of each other with ease as shown. So so so cute for any and all Kirby fans. Package arrived with no damage, on time and nicely packed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Theses are super cute and good quality! My 12 year old loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Shopuntilyoudrop

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great Kirby figures! I really liked them and the star is just so cute! I tried to stack them but just couldnt. I would have been nice if it had magnets. Perfect for Kirby and Nintendo Fans!
customer_reviews.author: Mario J.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them to any Kirby fan
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and well made, while we have not been able to replicate all the ways you can stack them, we have been successful with some! It is a challenge! I would recommend them to any Kirby fan. Just don't buy them expecting to be able to stack them as they appear on the box! ....at least not right away!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: no stacking
customer_reviews.text: I can not for the life of me get these to stack but they are good anyway. good Kirbys.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Easily stackable? Debatable. Adorable? Undeniable.
customer_reviews.text: I have little luck in stacking these little guys the way they are pictured on the box, but they are all shaped like friends so I don't really mind one bit. They have formed an armada of friendship along with my Kirby amiibo. I couldn't be happier with these little guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my five year old son who is obsessed with kirby and he loved it. It is almost impossible for us to stack the kirbies up as shown, but they are good quality toys with a lot of detail on them. They are my son's new favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunker85

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend and she absolutely loved it! The box was a little damaged, but the figures were safe and looked adorable with good quality! A perfect gift for Kirby Kollectors! ;)
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Kirby is Adorable but Clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable, but a little too difficult to stack, especially like they're showed in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Happy even though I can't stack any higher than 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Pictures posted, and on box made the product look as if it was stackable, making me think there were magnets or something to stack them up, but there wasn't. It's really hard to get them to stack higher than 3 up. Still really cute. Packaged well. Arrived earlier than expected. Happy even though I can't stack any higher than 3 Kirbys. Maybe user defect.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Warner

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and the material they are made of is of really good quality. I thought it was going to be cheap plastic. It doesn't seem like the paint would peel off easily either. It is a bit challenging to stack them up like the pictures, but it can be done. Pictures to come
customer_reviews.author: Xem

customer_reviews.title: Well made Kirbys
customer_reviews.text: Well made & as pictured. These are small (just under an inch wide) and I never stack them like they suggest. They would easily fall over, but as a temporary challenge, yeah, you could pull it off. Have fun Kirby stacking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: difficult to stack
customer_reviews.text: it was hard to stack to have on display on a desk. cool box, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: These are some stackable Kirby's
customer_reviews.text: Like kirb? Like stacks? This is the product for you
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: and are just adorable little things
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to stack. Each one has a slightly different size, stance, and shape. A lot of the poses on the box are almost impossible to pull off. That said, they stack very well 2-3 high, and are just adorable little things.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Black

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to go on my desk at work. In my downtime I try and stack them, although I don’t get it all the time haha. Love them! Might get a second set to add to the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lynoris

customer_reviews.title: But their detail is very good for their size
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly cute! These little guys are really small, about the size of a marble for most of them. But their detail is very good for their size, and my daughters have a lot of fun playing with them, trying to stack and pose them like the images on the box. Well worth it for the Kirby/Nintendo fan in your life
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Boeckman

customer_reviews.title: Great detail on each Kirby
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Kirby! So I added it to his cake this year, small but super adorable. They are hard to stack on top of each other but we will try to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle zamora

customer_reviews.title: Simply cute
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much too the product; just a bunch of little Kirby figures. As far as quality and packaging go it is worth the price for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brady C.

customer_reviews.title: Poyo!
customer_reviews.text: It’s tiny little Kirbys directly from Japan. What more do you need to know?
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Make better Kirby toys than this
customer_reviews.text: Very small, thought you would be able to stack them. Make better Kirby toys than this!
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and it looks super adorable! If you or your loved ones like Kirby this can make a great Xmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got these. They are so cute, very small and quite a few of them! Got here earlier than expected. Thanks for the extra care in packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Eric New

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little guys
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. I’ve wanted this set for a while now and I’m so glad to have it! Description said they were like new and I think they may be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a Kirby fan but don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: I love Kirby and this set is great but don't be fooled by the pictures. I have know idea how they are able to stack the Kirby's without glue. The star base and the Kirby's are not magnetized. I gave up stacking the after a few tries because I didn't want to scuff up the Kirby's. That said the Kirby's are nicely detailed and to have Kirby in ten different poses is great to have in one set. Tallest figure is about a inch tall.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: So absolutely cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and design of this toy; I can't wait to see it in use on my son's birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool for displaying, not at all for stacking.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping time on these were much faster than advertised. They are very well made and have great packaging. They however do not stack at all, despite whatever you see online or in the advertising. One of the Kirby figures also doesn't stand. But 9/10 is still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Rares Gruian

customer_reviews.title: He has never been able to stack them like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He has never been able to stack them like the picture shows, but he does play with them along with his mario, luigi and sonic figures.
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawkmomma

customer_reviews.title: Not for stacking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my nephew for Christmas. He loved them but used them more as figurines than stacking. They are very difficult to stack as they are all rounded on the top.
customer_reviews.author: flintstone3

customer_reviews.title: I think that these figures are great! They're modeling is great
customer_reviews.text: I think that these figures are great! They're modeling is great, and they fit in with the rest of my collection. The only problem I could ever think of is that the box claims you can stack them, but I've had no luck (probably a me problem).
customer_reviews.author: ATL

customer_reviews.title: Kirby MASS ATTACK!
customer_reviews.text: These guys are such a hit, girlfriend loved em. Highly recommended for any kirby fan... Beware though, some of the puzzles are hard to balance.
customer_reviews.author: Zer0

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my niece. She loved them. Hard to stack tho.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my boyfriend and I couldn't help but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and I couldn't help but want to play with them myself, very cute, but smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelai P

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, hard to stack
customer_reviews.text: Super cool detailed lovely. Kinda hard to actually stack. I thought they would be magnets or something
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MOST excellent! Finally, a novel Kirby idea for gifting to my son! He LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.author: C3O

customer_reviews.title: Must-have kirby item
customer_reviews.text: A great gift for Kirby lovers. Very good quality with a boatload of cuteness attached to it. Great for decorating your game room with.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Apicella

customer_reviews.title: it's actually pretty hard to stack them but the challenge is part ...
customer_reviews.text: amazingly cute!! it's actually pretty hard to stack them but the challenge is part of the fun :) I love Kirby and this purchase just made my day/life basically.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Yang

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE THESE!!! You can be extremely creative with these. With the 10 Kirby's and the warp star you can make endless combinations and designs. And since they are PVC they are very durable and won't be damaged if they fall.
customer_reviews.author: Ta-Hajj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is SUPER fun & yes, all puzzles are possible. I have completed them all. Great for parties!
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cant stack.
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing and are super cute, but are nearly impossible to stack. Good luck making them look like the pictures. They need some sort of way to stack them better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Leshock

customer_reviews.title: SUPER super cute
customer_reviews.text: Kinda smaller than I thought. SUPER super cute. Bought as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. The balancing takes a bit to get right but overall they are very cute
customer_reviews.author: Max Wydra

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I got them for my sister and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I got them for my sister and I did this thing where I stacked them all around her room before she got home. She was ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Lux

customer_reviews.title: he LOVED them. He love kirby and he thought they ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY CUTE! i bought these figures for my boyfriend's birthday. he LOVED them. He love kirby and he thought they were so cute. We just had trouble stacking them like the pics. they are also a lot smaller than I thought it would be .
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they’re cute and great quality but they don’t stack very well.. still adorable though!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and cute. A must have for any Kirby fan.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: they don't really stack like that, at least our set didn't
customer_reviews.text: they don't really stack like that, at least our set didn't. But my 6yr old boy got over that quickly and played with them. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Sah

customer_reviews.title: and the price is actually pretty cheap given that it's well made and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than I expected, and the price is actually pretty cheap given that it's well made and they are really cute. I tried to stack them according to the pictures, was harder than it looked like...but still, it comes with 10 Kirbys and a warp star can't really complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Yi-Chen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little Kirbys, I have them spread around my other figurines as well
customer_reviews.author: Jorden F.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, and absolutely adorable! Great for decorating in a line or on a shelf. At a great gift price, these guys are totally rad!
customer_reviews.author: jake kissner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson! He plays with them all the time. He loves them. I'm really happy with them and his reaction.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son was so happy with these! loves posing them!
customer_reviews.author: Ron and Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you love Kirby, just get them, best Kirby product I belive !
customer_reviews.author: gash_rain

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my little sister in law She absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a xmas gift for my little sister in law She absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cutest little Kirbys in the world. Kind of hard to stack, but it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Noel C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to get this. Thinks they are just sooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: smashed box
customer_reviews.text: The box came in pretty beat up but otherwise everything is good
customer_reviews.author: Robert Willis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable. Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Solid construction, cute faces. For a frame of reference, each Kirby is about the size of a packing peanut
customer_reviews.author: Reid Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool. Great novelty item for any desk or display. The figures are well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Karpinski

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any Kirby fan and lover. They look adorable with all my other Nintendo collectibles.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Fierke

customer_reviews.title: This toy is adorable, My daughter has been asking for ten Kirby ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable, My daughter has been asking for ten Kirby toys for months, and this was the only one I could find. I took a chance in ordering them from another country, because the estimated delivery date range was just before to considerably after her birthday, which is what we wanted the gift for. To my amazement, it arrived a mere four days after I placed the order - almost an entire month before the estimated delivery range. I'm incredibly impressed with the speed of the delivery, and the toy is absolutely perfect. My daughter is going to be very excited on her birthday when she opens it up. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cute desk toy, stacking is a bit hard, but their cuteness is overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these little figures. They came UPS on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stack quite as easily as advertised, but still quite awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: super cute and way smaller than i expected but still way cute
customer_reviews.author: M. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and really fun to play with or just display.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Corral

customer_reviews.title: The figures look really nice. They are hard to stack
customer_reviews.text: The figures look really nice. They are hard to stack, but I guess that's part of the puzzle. It easy to get a 1, maybe 2, tier stack. When I can't stack them, I just put them all in a "scene" of sorts by just putting them around each other for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Even being a grown man I saw this and "had" to have it. Kirby has always been a favorite of mine and this little game/collectible is amazing. got to my door in less then four days and came in perfect condition. The little kirby's are very well made and had more weight to them then I had originally thought they would. All in all its an awesome buy for a loved one or even your grown self!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

product_meta.title: ensky Kirby Adventure Stackable NOS-20 Nosechara Mini Figure
product_meta.description: Kirby is a fictional character and the protagonist of the Kirby series of video games owned by Nintendo and HAL Laboratory. As one of Nintendo's most famous and familiar icons, Kirby's round appearance and ability to copy his foes' powers has made him a well known figure in video games, consistently ranked as one of the most iconic video game characters. He first appeared in 1992 in Kirby's Dream Land for the Game Boy.
